name: [Siberia]
storyline: You're on your way to your family vacation, when you're suddenly forced out of the plane above the Siberian tundra. Luckily you manage to grab a parachute, unluckily the parachute is tangled. Through your decisions, you must find a way to survive on the tundra, and escape the hell-hole you've found yourself in. Not only this, but you have to juggle your stats (health, hunger, thirst, heat, hygiene).
summary: A small, retro, text-adventure survival game - set in remote Siberia. There's 3 endings for you to discover, and 80+ dialogue options.
